title: Arcade Udyr
body:
http://fc06.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2014/323/2/7/arcade_udyr_by_krizalidbrando-d86xp7o.png
Inspired by Hotline Miami. All his animations appear as pixelated animals. I hope you like it.

replies.body: I like the concept, but a thing about skins is that they have to retain the general sillouette of the character they are for, or they could easly be confused for another champion. This skin doesn't have any sense of Udyr's fairly unique sillouette, and could cause a lot of in-game confusion. While there maye be one or two excpetions to this rule, even the exceptions retain a characters most defining features, while this doesn't have retain Udyr's iconic skirt. I reccomend trying something like tying a hoodie around his waist in order to emulate the skirt look that is a staple of Udyr's visual design.
I don't know honestly. To me Udyr's main feature are animals, I've never actually looked at his skirt. But thanks for your opinion as it makes sense.
